nl.esciencecenter.neon.math

Class Point4

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.neon.math.Float4Vector
      • nl.esciencecenter.neon.math.Point4
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FloatVector

    public class Point4
extends Float4Vector
    A optional, more specific Float4Vector implementation for points.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Point4()
      Stand-in for a 4-place vector, where the fourth place is always 1f.
      Point4(Float3Vector vec)
      Stand-in for a 4-place vector, where the fourth place is always 1f.
      Point4(Float4Vector v)
      Stand-in for a 4-place vector, where the fourth place is always 1f.
      Point4(float x, float y, float z)
      Stand-in for a 4-place vector, where the fourth place is always 1f.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Point4

        public Point4()
        Stand-in for a 4-place vector, where the fourth place is always 1f.

      • Point4

        public Point4(Float3Vector vec)
        Stand-in for a 4-place vector, where the fourth place is always 1f.
        Parameters:
        vec - The xyz values of this point.

      • Point4

        public Point4(Float4Vector v)
        Stand-in for a 4-place vector, where the fourth place is always 1f.
        Parameters:
        v - A vector of which the fourth place will be discarded and replaced by 1f.

      • Point4

        public Point4(float x,
      float y,
      float z)
        Stand-in for a 4-place vector, where the fourth place is always 1f.
        Parameters:
        x - The x value of this point.
        y - The y value of this point.
        z - The z value of this point.
